episodes.synopsis: When three boys hire Ron Snuffkin to pretend to be their dad after their real father is jailed, they discover that he's smarter than they thought.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A string of burglaries have the kids on edge, prompting Ron to concoct a scheme to pretend to rob them so that he can swoop in and save them.
episodes.title: Break In

episodes.synopsis: While Ron befriends an unsuspecting cop and brokers a shady scheme involving south-of-the-border prescriptions, the boys decide to make a movie.
episodes.title: Golden Ticket

episodes.synopsis: When Robby's teacher becomes suspicious of Ron's behavior, he invites her over for dinner, and the guys scramble to create 15 years of photo history.
episodes.title: Family Album

episodes.synopsis: When the boys get chicken pox, Ron cares for them until he develops symptoms, too, and Brandon falls for a girl who only likes him because he's sick.
episodes.title: Chicken Pox

episodes.synopsis: When Ron chaperones Gary on an out-of-town debate, Gary learns what his teammates really think of him, and Angela watches Brandon and Robby at home.
episodes.title: Debate Trip

episodes.synopsis: When Ron overhears the boys talking about a Father's Day gift, he assumes it's for him and he works hard to get the boys something special in return.
episodes.title: Father's Day

episodes.synopsis: Ron mistakenly believes that his ex-girlfriend, Gina, wants to reunite, and he enlists the boys in his attempts to win her back.
episodes.title: Gina

episodes.synopsis: When Ron gets a dog for the boys, they fall in love with him and name him Waffles, but Ron discovers a secret about Waffles that means he can't stay.
episodes.title: Dog Days of Tucson

episodes.synopsis: Ron convinces the Gundersons to host a party for Robby make friends his age, but Ron¿s plan is a clever disguise for a secret motive.
episodes.title: Kisses & Beads

episodes.synopsis: Ron surprises Glenn with tickets to an adult film convention, but forgets he is supposed to watch Robby that day, so they end up bringing him along.
episodes.title: Glenn's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: When Robby enters a ballroom-dancing competition, Gary pushes him in order to meet his own failed dancing dreams while Ron becomes a "pageant parent."
episodes.title: Sally Teel

episodes.synopsis: When Ron starts spending too much time with his girlfriend, the boys get upset and Ron decides to quit, but the boys' new caretaker is a failure.
episodes.title: Ron Quits

video.title: Sons of Tucson
video.synopsis: Left parentless after their father is jailed for a white-collar crime, three wealthy brothers hire a cash-strapped slacker to pose as their dad.
